connect.name: CONNECT
connect.summary: The HTTP CONNECT method starts two-way communications with the requested resource.

delete.name: DELETE
delete.summary: The HTTP DELETE request method deletes the specified resource.

get.name: GET
get.summary: The HTTP GET method requests a representation of the specified resource.

head.name: HEAD
head.summary: The HTTP HEAD method requests the headers that would be returned if the HEAD request's URL was instead requested with the HTTP GET method.

options.name: OPTIONS
options.summary: The HTTP OPTIONS method requests permitted communication options for a given URL or server.

patch.name: PATCH
patch.summary: The HTTP PATCH request method applies partial modifications to a resource.

post.name: POST
post.summary: The HTTP POST method sends data to the server.

put.name: PUT
put.summary: The HTTP PUT request method creates a new resource or replaces a representation of the target resource with the request payload.

trace.name: TRACE
trace.summary: The HTTP TRACE method performs a message loop-back test along the path to the target resource, providing a useful debugging mechanism.
